meanings.definition: Pretending to be someone else for entertainment.
meanings.sent1: The children put on a playacting performance for their parents.
meanings.sent2: She is known for her playacting skills in the school drama club.
meanings.sent3: The playacting squirrel entertained the park visitors with its funny antics.
meanings.sent4: His playacting behavior at work made it hard for others to take him seriously.
meanings.sent5: The playacting magician amazed the audience with his tricks and illusions.

meanings.definition: The act of performing in a play or theatrical production.
meanings.sent1: The playacting in the school play was very convincing.
meanings.sent2: She has always dreamed of a career in playacting on Broadway.
meanings.sent3: The playacting in the comedy play had everyone laughing out loud.
meanings.sent4: The playacting on stage transported the audience to a different world.
meanings.sent5: The playacting in the Shakespearean play was both dramatic and captivating.
